spells.description_en: A wave of flame that can set fire to enemies before me.
spells.description_cn: 一股能够点燃面前敌人的火焰之波。

spells.description_en: A simple fireball projectile. May light enemies on fire.
spells.description_cn: 一个简单的火球投射物，可能点燃敌人。

spells.description_en: I summon a few fireflies to aid me in battle.
spells.description_cn: 召唤少量火焰飞蝇协助我作战。

spells.description_en: Flames erupt along the targeted path for a brief time.
spells.description_cn: 在目标路径上短暂地喷发出火焰。

spells.description_en: Any source of fire in the target area is consumed and explodes.
spells.description_cn: 目标区域内的任何火源都会被消耗并爆炸。

spells.description_en: A small projectile that explodes upon contact.
spells.description_cn: 一个小型投射物，接触时爆炸。

spells.description_en: An icy shockwave chills all enemies around me.
spells.description_cn: 一股冰冷的冲击波会冻结我周围的所有敌人。

spells.description_en: A beam of ice that freezes everything in its path.
spells.description_cn: 一道冰光束，冻结路径上的一切。

spells.description_en: I summon a few iceflies to aid me in battle.
spells.description_cn: 召唤少量冰霜飞蝇协助我作战。

spells.description_en: My skin becomes like stone, deflecting the next attack.
spells.description_cn: 我的皮肤变得如石头般坚硬，能偏转下一次攻击。

spells.description_en: All attacks with the coated weapon may poison my opponent. Lost when sheathed.
spells.description_cn: 给武器涂毒，攻击时可能使敌人中毒。收刀时效果消失。

spells.description_en: A cage of sharp roots surrounds my target.
spells.description_cn: 用尖锐的树根形成的牢笼困住目标。

spells.description_en: Thorned bushes sprout along the targeted area for a brief moment.
spells.description_cn: 在目标区域短暂地生长出带刺的灌木丛。

spells.description_en: Corrupts blood slimes into acidic oozes and compels both slimes and oozes to join me.
spells.description_cn: 将血史莱姆腐蚀成酸性粘液怪，并驱使史莱姆和粘液怪加入我方。

spells.description_en: Nearby foliage comes to life and defends for a short period of time.
spells.description_cn: 使附近的植物活化，在短时间内为我方提供防御。

spells.description_en: Teleport to the target location. This will also confuse my opponents.
spells.description_cn: 传送到目标位置。此举还会使敌人困惑。

spells.description_en: I summon a lightning elemental to aid me.
spells.description_cn: 召唤一个闪电元素来协助我。

spells.description_en: A bolt of lightning called from the sky to strike the target area.
spells.description_cn: 一道闪电从天空召唤而来，打击目标区域。

spells.description_en: I summon a storm of terrible proportions.
spells.description_cn: 召唤一场规模可怕的雷暴。

spells.description_en: A quick magic projectile. Weak, but easy to cast.
spells.description_cn: 一个快速的魔法投射物。威力较弱，但易于施放。

spells.description_en: Converts health into armor.
spells.description_cn: 将生命值转化为护甲。

spells.description_en: I float for a period of time.
spells.description_cn: 悬浮一段时间。

spells.description_en: A beam of magic that hits everything in its path after a brief charge.
spells.description_cn: 一束魔法光束，在短暂充能后击中路径上的所有目标。

spells.description_en: I summon a few magiflies to aid me in battle.
spells.description_cn: 召唤少量奥术飞蝇协助我作战。

spells.description_en: I summon a few bladeflies to aid me in battle.
spells.description_cn: 召唤少量刀锋飞蝇协助我作战。

spells.description_en: Summon a cloud of magiflies and immediately command them to attack.
spells.description_cn: 召唤一群奥术飞蝇并立即命令它们发动攻击。

spells.description_en: I summon a diary to record my experience.
spells.description_cn: 召唤一本日记存储我的经验。

spells.description_en: I summon the god Liho favored by me to intervene on my behalf.
spells.description_cn: 召唤我所信奉的神灵Liho代表我干预战斗。

spells.description_en: Enemies in the target area lose their experience.
spells.description_cn: 目标区域内的敌人掉落经验。

spells.description_en: Enemies hit by the cloud of dust will be stunned for a few seconds.
spells.description_cn: 被尘埃云击中的敌人将被眩晕数秒。

spells.description_en: My next attack is substantially stronger.
spells.description_cn: 我的下一次攻击将大幅增强。

spells.description_en: A swift charge forward. This can also destroy objects.
spells.description_cn: 快速向前冲锋，此效果也可破坏物体。

spells.description_en: A circle of force pushes away all those around me.
spells.description_cn: 释放力量圆环，推开周围所有敌人。

spells.description_en: I turn invisible for a short period.
spells.description_cn: 在短时间内进入隐形状态。

spells.description_en: I become enraged, increasing my aggression, speed, and strength.
spells.description_cn: 陷入狂怒状态，提升攻击性、速度和力量。

spells.description_en: Some of my wounds are healed.
spells.description_cn: 治愈我的一部分伤势。

spells.description_en: Enemies and plants are sapped of life, which I add to my own.
spells.description_cn: 吸取敌人和植物的生命力，转化为自身的生命值。

spells.description_en: I consume nearby corpses to feed myself.
spells.description_cn: 吞噬附近的尸体以恢复自身。

spells.description_en: Nearby human corpses are raised as ravenous undead zombies.
spells.description_cn: 将附近的人类尸体复活为贪婪的亡灵僵尸。

spells.description_en: Nearby corpses are raised to fight alongside me.
spells.description_cn: 复活附近的尸体协助我作战。

spells.description_en: Nearby enemies flee in terror.
spells.description_cn: 附近的敌人因恐惧而逃跑。

spells.description_en: Nearby corpses will spread a plague.
spells.description_cn: 附近的尸体将传播瘟疫。

spells.description_en: Nearby corpses explode over the next few seconds.
spells.description_cn: 附近的尸体将在接下来的几秒内爆炸。
